description: Manage managed identity settings for an Azure Media Services account.

commands.name: az ams account identity assign
commands.summary: Assign a managed identity to an Azure Media Services account.
commands.syntax:
az ams account identity assign [--ids]
                               [--name]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--system-assigned {false, true}]
                               [--user-assigned]
examples: az ams account identity assign -n myAmsAccount -g myRG --system-assigned
az ams account identity assign -n myAmsAccount -g myRG --user-assigned myUserId

commands.name: az ams account identity remove
commands.summary: Remove a managed identity to an Azure Media Services account.
commands.syntax:
az ams account identity remove [--ids]
                               [--name]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--system-assigned {false, true}]
                               [--user-assigned]
examples: az ams account identity remove -n myAmsAccount -g myRG --system-assigned
az ams account identity remove -n myAmsAccount -g myRG --user-assigned myUserId

commands.name: az ams account identity show
commands.summary: Show the details of managed identity settings for an Azure Media Services account.
examples: az ams account identity show -n myAmsAccount -g myRG
